metadata.title: CVE-2022-29915 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2022-29915` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 100.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
firefox-geckodriver - 100.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 100.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> starting with Ubuntu 22.04, the firefox package is just a script that installs the Firefox snap

criterions.comment: firefox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '100.0+build2-0ubuntu0.21.10.1').
